amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the prohibition of taxpayer dollars and resources being used to automatically deduct union dues from the pay of Federal employees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 597 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 75.

action.text: Amendment SA 597 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Scott.
